p: Most patients have a good prognosis, with mild flu-like symptoms ( del Rio and Malani, 2020). However, a small percentage, particularly the elderly and those with underlying diseases may develop complications such as arrhythmia, shock, acute renal failure, acute cardiac injury, acute respiratory distress syndrome, etc. ( Guo et al., 2020). Overall, the case fatality rate is estimated to be 2–3% ( Rodriguez-Morales et al., 2020), while it is as high as 8–15% in older adults ( del Rio and Malani, 2020).
